channel.title: Rest on JNyman.com
channel.description: Recent content in Rest on JNyman.com

item.title: Swagger is too Restrictive
item.description: Swagger has a definite idea of what makes a good URL. But if you want to do anything outside of that good luck. I think, that even though it seems like a good idea to push people towards a standard it doesn’t allow the user to really create RESTful APIs which suit their own needs. Let’s say that you have a reports resource. Sometimes you would like to get the JSON data of the report.
